p: The crude leave extract and crude endophytic extracts were weighed separately into empty autoclaved McCartney bottles to ensure sterility. A minimal amount of dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) (0.1%) was used to dissolve the crude extracts, and Mueller-Hinton (MH) broth was added to bring the volume of the dissolved crude extract to a concentration of 32â€‰mg/mL as the stock solution.
